entry.title: $2250 // Amazing 2 br with Laundry, Roof Deck, and Bike storage!!
entry.content:
Spacious true 2 bedroom in a prime Bushwick location!


Apartment features stainless steel appliances, queen sized bedrooms with windows and ample closet space, and central heat/ac. Perfect for roommate privacy with bedrooms on opposite ends of the apartment.

Laundry and bike storage are in the basement. Shared roof deck for the building with jaw-dropping views of Manhattan! Right around the corner from Food Bazaar, Starbucks, Planet Fitness, and many more local favorite coffee shops, restaurants and bars.


STEPS from Myrtle-Wyckoff M and L trains. You don't want to miss out on this awesome apartment!
NO FEE!! NO FEE!! NO FEE!! NO FEE!!
-Bike Storage

-Laundry In Building

-Roof Deck

-Central A/C

-Central Heat

-Hardwood Floors

-Renovated, Stainless Steel Appliances

Call, email, or text anytime to set up a viewing with Elena :-)
six one 7 // 84 zero / 2 six six 4
